__e: From my reading of the history of your son, from his writing, it seemed as though there was a transformation that happened politically for him from 9/11 to the invasion of Iraq. Something started to change in his tone.
Thank you. Thanks for invading my home. For putting me on the run.
Does your wife love you enough to call off the invasion of my country?
We been on dry runs for this invasion... for seven months in England.
We're on our way to the greatest invasion of this war.
We were celebrating the invasion of France.
